name: Accounting classification for short positions derivation rule
description: This derivation rule aims to obtain the Accounting classification for short positions from its building blocks.
algorithm:

  CASE
    WHEN SHRT_SCRTY_PSTN_PRDNTL_PRTFL_ASSGNMNT_TYP = 4
    THEN 3
    WHEN SHRT_SCRTY_PSTN_PRDNTL_PRTFL_ASSGNMNT_TYP = 3
